issue.title: [CF 1502] ElvUI - Upcoming Cooldown Text Changes
issue.body:
Hello,

 

Some new changes to cooldown text currently in the dev build of ElvUI are causing TMW to spit out errors. 

 

Just thought i would give you a heads-up of the changes. These errors only occur when running the dev code of ElvUI with the cooldown changes.

 

41x ...onModules\IconModule_CooldownSweep\CooldownSweep.lua:263: attempt to index field 'cooldown' (a nil value)
...onModules\IconModule_CooldownSweep\CooldownSweep.lua:263: in function `UpdateCooldown'
...onModules\IconModule_CooldownSweep\CooldownSweep.lua:332: in function <...onModules\IconModule_CooldownSweep\CooldownSweep.lua:329>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[3]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[3]"]:5>
(tail call): ?
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-8.4.4.lua:799: in function `Fire'
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-8.4.4.lua:2588: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2534>

Locals:
nil

 

Changes:

https://git.tukui.org/elvui/elvui/commits/development?utf8=âœ“&search=cooldown


> Posted by CurseForge user Torchler | Imported from CurseForge issue #1502 | Raw

comments.body:
Thanks for the heads up - should be fixed now.
